title: Dark Seductions: Tales of Erotic Horror
description: Explore the darkest depths of the human heart in fourteen sensual, sinister stories from some of today's most imaginative horror writers, including Tamara Thorne.Horror heaven / C. Dean Andersson & Nina Romberg --Gloves / Richard Lee Byers --Playing the victim / Scott Ciencin --Hard / Stephen R. George --Ups and downs / Pat Graversen --Nameless one / Kathryn Meyer Griffith --Cousin's curse / Rick Hautala --Whorehouse hollow / Ronald Kelly --Private pleasures / Edward Lee --Dark seduction / Jean Simon --Good vibrations / Tamara Thorne --Spring wine / Lois Tilton --Just one more thing people can do / J.N. Williamson --Satisfaction / T. Lucien Wright.
author: Alice Alfonsi
